title: Executive Order 5605-A-Radio Frequencies
content: Executive Order No. 5197-A, dated September 30, 1929, entitled "Assignment of Frequencies to Government Radio Stations," is hereby amended so as to delete the assignment to the Navy of 68 kc.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5605-A-Radio Frequencies Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/376099
